note: Mainly posting about my passion : Argentine Tango / Salon Tango. Encouraging others to dance for their well being and fitness. I am a retired business professional and former teacher/lecturer now fully engaged with living my best life, immersed in nature in a rural setting in Wales UK. Other interests include two Yorkshire Terriers, growing fruit, vegetables and flowering plants, shrubs and trees. Family and friends are foremost in my existence; we meet on a weekly basis for coffee catch-ups

fields.name: Female
